Name: Zoning, 150 Mill Street Rezoning, Brooklyn (C 220080 ZMK).
Title: Application number C 220080 ZMK (150 Mill Street Rezoning) submitted by B.P. Mill Street, LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 16c, by changing from an M1-1 District to an M1-5 District, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 6, Council District 38.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
